pages.text: Barbclabornia is a xenacanthid shark from the Early Permian period. It was a large freshwater filter feeding shark, similar to modern Basking and Whale sharks. This would mean that it primarily ate zooplankton.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Block Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Egg Collection Phial
